definition: to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]

sentences.english: Most boys keep them locked in their lockers and they're turned off.
sentences.chinese: 大多数男孩子把手机锁在储物柜里，并把手机关掉。

sentences.english: He shuts his locker door and stands near the other P.I. guys.
sentences.chinese: 他关上储物柜的门，和其他PI工作组员站到一起。

sentences.english: The other boys had slammed him against the lockers.
sentences.chinese: 他曾被其他男孩关进储物柜。

sentences.english: I care about more lockers for the teachers.
sentences.chinese: 我关心教师要有更多的储物柜。

sentences.english: Mareya helped me look for it . Luckily, we found Tex’s hat in my locker.
sentences.chinese: 玛瑞娅也帮我找，幸运的是，我们在储物柜找到了它。

sentences.english: One of the corridors with the lockers containing personal dosimeters.
sentences.chinese: 一个存放个人辐射剂量器储物柜的走廊。

sentences.english: Lockers and doors inside here are also painted dark green.
sentences.chinese: 这里的储物柜和门也涂成深绿色。

sentences.english: Lever-tumbler locks are often used in briefcases, safe-deposit boxes, and lockers.
sentences.chinese: 杠杆式弹子锁通常用于公文包，保管箱，及储物柜。

sentences.english: Leggage is stored in a locker, usually somewhere outside of the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 行李被寄存在旅馆外的储物柜中。

sentences.english: I closed my locker door, hung my head low, and fought back a tear.
sentences.chinese: 我关上储物柜的门，低垂着头，强忍住眼泪。

sentences.english: No. 9:Here is your key to locker . Pleaes take it care.
sentences.chinese: 这是您储物柜的钥匙，请妥善保管好。

sentences.english: We put our luggage in a locker at the train station before we started our city tour.
sentences.chinese: 我们开始市区观光之前先把行李放在火车站的储物柜。

sentences.english: Before windowsill store the habit that content ark can help their nurturance liquidate goods.
sentences.chinese: 窗台前的储物柜可以帮助他们养成整理物品的习惯。

sentences.english: Lockers will be provided for employees' personal ITems.
sentences.chinese: 带锁的储物柜可供员工存放个人物品。

sentences.english: They were able to steal my wallet, because I had forgotten to lock the locker.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能偷了我的钱包，因为我之前忘记锁储物柜了。

definition: to receive/to accept/to take in/to hold
cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
